name: Clink (alexchapman)
description:
Clink is a student project made as part of a prototyping course. It was developed by a four person team in two weeks.

In Clink, you play as an air hockey puck making its way through a series of puzzling rinks! Slide across a handful of different levels by reaching the net in each one.

Team Members

  • Gabe Abernathy: Programming
  • Alex Chapman: Design & Production
  • Morgan Harrell: Design & Programming
  • Matt Lalas: Art & Sound
